	We are to grow up in every way. Complete growth. Every area. No part left immature.

	Into him who is the head. Growing into Christ. Becoming like Him. Maturing toward His image.

	Into Christ. He's the goal. The standard. The destination of growth.

	From whom the whole body, joined and held together. Christ holds the body together. Unity comes from Him.

	By every joint with which it is equipped. Every connection matters. Every relationship important.

	When each part is working properly. Everyone functioning. Each member contributing.

	Makes the body grow so that it builds itself up in love. Love builds. The body grows through love.

	Speak truth in love. Both are essential for growth.

	Jesus, help me speak truth in love! I want to grow up into You in every way. Make me mature, building others up in love. Truth and love together! Amen.
devotionals.books: Rather, speaking the truth in love, we are to grow up in every way into him who is the head, into Christ, from whom the whole body, joined and held together by every joint with which it is equipped, when each part is working properly, makes the body grow so that it builds itself up in love. - Ephesians 4:15-16

devotionals.title: No Longer Walk as Gentiles
devotionals.devotionalText:
Now this I say and testify in the Lord, that you must no longer walk as the Gentiles do, in the futility of their minds. Don't walk like those who don't know God.

	You must no longer walk as the Gentiles do. Past behavior. Former lifestyle. Not anymore.

	In the futility of their minds. Empty thinking. Pointless reasoning. Minds without God are futile.

	They are darkened in their understanding. Spiritual blindness. Mental darkness. Can't see truth.

	Alienated from the life of God. Separated. Disconnected. Without God's life.

	Because of the ignorance that is in them. Not knowing God creates ignorance. Spiritual blindness.

	Due to their hardness of heart. Hard hearts create blind minds. Stubbornness blocks truth.

	But that is not the way you learned Christ. You learned differently. Christ taught you truth.

	You're not like them anymore. Walk differently.

	Father, I don't walk like those who don't know You! Thank You for enlightening my mind and softening my heart. I learned Christ, and I walk in His truth! Amen.
devotionals.books: Now this I say and testify in the Lord, that you must no longer walk as the Gentiles do, in the futility of their minds. They are darkened in their understanding, alienated from the life of God because of the ignorance that is in them, due to their hardness of heart. - Ephesians 4:17-18

devotionals.title: Put Off the Old, Put On the New
devotionals.devotionalText:
To put off your old self, which belongs to your former manner of life and is corrupt through deceitful desires, and to be renewed in the spirit of your minds, and to put on the new self. Take off the old like dirty clothes. Put on the new like clean garments.

	Put off your old self. Decisive action. Remove it. Take it off like filthy rags.

	Which belongs to your former manner of life. Past tense. Previous existence. No longer yours.

	And is corrupt through deceitful desires. The old self is corrupted. Its desires lie. Its cravings deceive.

	To be renewed in the spirit of your minds. Mind renewal. Thought transformation. Mental renovation.

	And to put on the new self. Put it on like new clothes. Wear your new identity.

	Created after the likeness of God. The new self resembles God. Made in His image.

	In true righteousness and holiness. Real righteousness. Genuine holiness. Not fake spirituality.

	Old self off. New self on. Complete wardrobe change.

	Father, I put off my old self and put on the new! Renew my mind and help me wear my new identity created in Your likeness. Old is gone, new is on! Amen.
devotionals.books: To put off your old self, which belongs to your former manner of life and is corrupt through deceitful desires, and to be renewed in the spirit of your minds, and to put on the new self, created after the likeness of God in true righteousness and holiness. - Ephesians 4:22-24

devotionals.title: Be Angry and Do Not Sin
devotionals.devotionalText:
Be angry and do not sin; do not let the sun go down on your anger, and give no opportunity to the devil. Anger isn't always sin. But handle it quickly.

	Be angry and do not sin. Righteous anger exists. Some things should make you angry. But don't let anger lead to sin.

	Do not let the sun go down on your anger. Deal with it today. Don't sleep on anger. Resolve it quickly.

	And give no opportunity to the devil. Unresolved anger opens doors. Satan exploits lingering anger.

	Let the thief no longer steal. Complete transformation. From taking to giving.

	But rather let him labor, doing honest work with his own hands. Work replaces theft. Creation replaces destruction.

	So that he may have something to share with anyone in need. Work to give, not just get. Generosity goal.

	Quick anger resolution. Complete life transformation. No opportunity for evil.

	Father, help me handle anger righteously! I won't let the sun set on my anger or give the devil opportunity. Transform me from taking to giving. Quick resolution! Amen.
devotionals.books: Be angry and do not sin; do not let the sun go down on your anger, and give no opportunity to the devil. - Ephesians 4:26-27

devotionals.title: Let No Corrupting Talk
devotionals.devotionalText:
Let no corrupting talk come out of your mouths, but only such as is good for building up, as fits the occasion, that it may give grace to those who hear. Your words should give grace.

	Let no corrupting talk come out of your mouths. Zero tolerance. No corrupt words. Nothing that tears down.

	But only such as is good for building up. Building words only. Construction, not destruction.

	As fits the occasion. Appropriate words. Right timing. Suitable for the situation.

	That it may give grace to those who hear. Your words should be gifts. Grace packages. Blessings to hearers.

	And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God. Your words affect the Spirit. He can be grieved.

	By whom you were sealed for the day of redemption. The Spirit sealed you. Guaranteed your redemption.

	Let all bitterness and wrath and anger and clamor and slander be put away. Remove all toxic communication.

	Your words matter. They either give grace or grieve the Spirit.

	Father, let no corrupting talk come from my mouth! Help me speak only words that build up and give grace. I don't want to grieve Your Spirit. My words will bless! Amen.
devotionals.books: Let no corrupting talk come out of your mouths, but only such as is good for building up, as fits the occasion, that it may give grace to those who hear. And do not grieve the Holy Spirit of God, by whom you were sealed for the day of redemption. - Ephesians 4:29-30

devotionals.title: Be Kind to One Another
devotionals.devotionalText:
Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you. Kindness, tenderness, and forgivenessâ€”like God showed you.

	Be kind to one another. Active kindness. Intentional goodness. Deliberate gentleness.

	Tenderhearted. Soft hearts. Compassionate spirits. Easily moved by others' needs.

	Forgiving one another. Quick forgiveness. Ready release. No grudge holding.

	As God in Christ forgave you. The standard for forgiveness. The measure. Complete, like Christ's.

	Therefore be imitators of God, as beloved children. Copy God. Mimic the Father. Act like His kid.

	And walk in love, as Christ loved us. Love is your path. Your way of life. Your daily walk.

	And gave himself up for us. Self-giving love. Sacrificial love. Love that costs.

	A fragrant offering and sacrifice to God. Your love life is worship. Sweet aroma to God.

	Be kind. Be tender. Be forgiving. Be like God.

	Father, make me kind, tenderhearted, and forgiving! Help me forgive as You forgave me in Christ. I want to imitate You and walk in love. Kindness flows from me! Amen.
devotionals.books: Be kind to one another, tenderhearted, forgiving one another, as God in Christ forgave you. - Ephesians 4:32

devotionals.title: Walk as Children of Light
devotionals.devotionalText:
For at one time you were darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Walk as children of light. You were darkness. Now you ARE light.

	For at one time you were darkness. Not in darknessâ€”you WERE darkness. That was your nature.

	But now you are light in the Lord. Not have lightâ€”you ARE light. Complete transformation.

	Walk as children of light. Live according to your new nature. Light children walk in light.

	For the fruit of light is found in all that is good and right and true. Light produces good fruit.

	And try to discern what is pleasing to the Lord. Figure out what pleases God. Seek His pleasure.

	Take no part in the unfruitful works of darkness. Zero participation. No partnership with darkness.

	But instead expose them. Light exposes darkness. Your life reveals what's hidden.

	You are light. Walk like it. Live like it.

	Father, I am light in You! Help me walk as a child of light, producing good, right, and true fruit. I take no part in darkness but expose it. I am light! Amen.
devotionals.books: For at one time you were darkness, but now you are light in the Lord. Walk as children of light (for the fruit of light is found in all that is good and right and true). - Ephesians 5:8-9

devotionals.title: Awake, O Sleeper
devotionals.devotionalText:
Therefore it says, 'Awake, O sleeper, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you.' Wake up from spiritual sleep. Christ's light is ready to shine.

	Awake, O sleeper. Spiritual sleep is dangerous. Wake up. Become alert. Open your spiritual eyes.

	And arise from the dead. Rise from spiritual death. Come alive. Stand up in new life.

	And Christ will shine on you. His light illuminates. His glory radiates. His presence brightens.

	Look carefully then how you walk. Pay attention. Be intentional. Walk deliberately.

	Not as unwise but as wise. Wisdom guides your steps. Not foolishness. Smart walking.

	Making the best use of the time. Redeem time. Maximize moments. Use time wisely.

	Because the days are evil. Evil surrounds. Time is short. Urgency required.

	Wake up. Rise up. Let Christ shine on you.

	Jesus, I wake up from spiritual sleep! I rise from the dead and let You shine on me. Help me walk wisely, making the best use of time. Shine Your light on me! Amen.
devotionals.books: Therefore it says, 'Awake, O sleeper, and arise from the dead, and Christ will shine on you.' Look carefully then how you walk, not as unwise but as wise, making the best use of the time, because the days are evil. - Ephesians 5:14-16

devotionals.title: Understand the Will of the Lord
devotionals.devotionalText:
Therefore do not be foolish, but understand what the will of the Lord is. God's will isn't hidden. You can understand it.

	Therefore do not be foolish. Foolishness is optional. You can choose wisdom. Don't be a fool.

	But understand what the will of the Lord is. God's will is understandable. Knowable. Discoverable.

	And do not get drunk with wine, for that is debauchery. Don't lose control to substances. Stay sober.

	But be filled with the Spirit. Be controlled by the Spirit. Under His influence. Full of Him.

	Addressing one another in psalms and hymns and spiritual songs. Spirit-filled people encourage each other.

	Singing and making melody to the Lord with your heart. Heart worship. Inner melody. Spiritual songs.

	Giving thanks always and for everything. Constant gratitude. Thanks in all things.

	Understand God's will. Be filled with the Spirit. Live wisely.

	Father, help me understand Your will! I choose wisdom over foolishness. Fill me with Your Spirit. Let me overflow with worship and gratitude. Your will is knowable! Amen.
devotionals.books: Therefore do not be foolish, but understand what the will of the Lord is. And do not get drunk with wine, for that is debauchery, but be filled with the Spirit. - Ephesians 5:17-18

devotionals.title: The Whole Armor of God
devotionals.devotionalText:
Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the schemes of the devil. You need all the armor, not just some pieces.

	Put on the whole armor of God. Complete armor. Every piece. Nothing missing.

	That you may be able to stand. Armor enables standing. Without it, you fall.

	Against the schemes of the devil. Satan has strategies. Plans. Schemes against you.

	For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood. Your enemy isn't human. People aren't the problem.

	But against the rulers, against the authorities. Spiritual hierarchies. Demonic structures.

	Against the cosmic powers over this present darkness. Dark forces. Evil powers.

	Against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places. Spiritual enemies in spiritual realms.

	Therefore take up the whole armor of God. Because the battle is spiritual, you need spiritual armor.

	Wear all of God's armor. You need every piece.

	Father, I put on Your whole armor! Every pieceâ€”nothing missing. Help me stand against Satan's schemes. My battle is spiritual, so I need spiritual armor. Fully armed! Amen.
devotionals.books: Put on the whole armor of God, that you may be able to stand against the schemes of the devil. For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness. - Ephesians 6:11-12

devotionals.title: Stand Therefore
devotionals.devotionalText:
Stand therefore, having fastened on the belt of truth, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness. Truth and righteousnessâ€”essential armor pieces.

	Stand therefore. Take your position. Hold your ground. Don't retreat.

	Having fastened on the belt of truth. Truth holds everything together. Lies make you vulnerable.

	And having put on the breastplate of righteousness. Righteousness protects your heart. Vital organ coverage.

	And, as shoes for your feet, having put on the readiness given by the gospel of peace. Ready feet. Peace gospel. Always prepared.

devotionals.books: Stand therefore, having fastened on the belt of truth, and having put on the breastplate of righteousness, and, as shoes for your feet, having put on the readiness given by the gospel of peace. - Ephesians 6:14-15

devotionals.title: Praying at All Times

devotionals.title: An Ambassador in Chains

devotionals.title: Peace to the Brothers

devotionals.title: Christ Our Life

devotionals.title: Put On the New Self

devotionals.title: Let the Word Dwell Richly

devotionals.title: Living in New Identity

devotionals.title: The One Who Came Back

Ten were healed, but only one returned.

devotionals.title: Trusting Jesus in the Process
